alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier and northwestern Hendry Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ave Maria, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Immokalee, Golden Gate Estates, Felda, Orangetree, Big Corkscrew Island, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Bunker Hill and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
